text: Xallxhˌ thrng yunyan wa thæcring mimi phu thi khwr di rab kar khearph sakkara dı «nxkcak phraxngkh theanan læa ma la xik ahˌ læa phu mi khwam ru nı thana darng wi sung khwam yutithrrm nan k yunyan dwywa mimi phu thi khwr di rab kar khearph sakkara dı «nxkcak phraxngkh phuthrng dechanuphaph phuthrng pricha yan theanan
